property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may take a spell, show that spell to your opponent and add it to your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell from your hand that has "Spark" in its name for no cost.

property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 5 or more Angel Command creatures in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Your opponent's creatures cost 5 more to summon.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap or untap a creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-32 Masters Chronicle Deck 2016: The Genesis by the Lord of Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have an Angel Command, you may choose both: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent put it into their deck, shuffles it, then draws a card: ► Tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature, ignore any effects that prevent your other creatures from attacking your opponent this turn. (Effects such as summoning sickness and "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players" are ignored. However, this effect doesn't let you attack creatures.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-32 Masters Chronicle Deck 2016: The Genesis by the Lord of Spirits

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may break one of your shields. Then you may shieldify a card from your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-32 Masters Chronicle Deck 2016: The Genesis by the Lord of Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from among them into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Tap one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Draw a card. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)
